tikoot.lauri.ddcc

Class DDCC_Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tikoot.lauri.ddcc.DDCC_Utils

  • public class DDCC_Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    DDCC_Utils contains practical methods from randomized integer suited for the app and simulating rolling the dies.

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int value)
        Method returns a randomized value between 1 (inclusive) and value(inclusive).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the randomized value

      • rollDie

        public static int rollDie(int die)
        Method simulates a single dice roll.
        Parameters:
        die - the amount of sides in dice (4, 6, 8, ..)
        Returns:
        the result of the roll

      • rollDies

        public static int rollDies(int die,
                           int times,
                           java.lang.String... options)
        Method simulates different kinds of die rolls used in roleplaying and returns the sum of the rolls. Method takes two bonus options currently:
        • "smallest" to drop the smallest die off the result
        • "biggest" to drop the biggest die off the result
        Note that only one option is taken, even though there is possibility to add more.
        Parameters:
        die - the amount of sides in the dice (4, 6, 8, ...)
        times - how many times the dice is rolled
        options - special rules
        Returns:
        the sum of the rolls

      • printList

        public static java.lang.String printList(int[][] list)
        Method makes a string containing values of two-dimensional array. Used for debug printing.
        Parameters:
        list - two dimensional-array to print
        Returns:
        string containing values of the array
